alert.note: Alert for Langlade (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:49PM CDT until May 10 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FOREST AND NORTH CENTRAL LANGLADE COUNTIES... At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crandon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crandon, North Otter Creek Natural Area, Woodlawn, Nashville, Argonne, Hiles, Otter Springs Recreation Area and Mole Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
